text: Finland competed at the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang, South Korea, from 9 to 25 February 2018, with 100 competitors in 11 sports. They won six medals in total, one gold, one silver and four bronze, ranking 18th in the medal table. == Medalists == |align="left" valign="top"| {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" |- !
